titleStmt.title: The famous whore, or noble curtizan conteining the lamentable complaint of Paulina, the famous Roman curtizan, sometimes mes. vnto the great Cardinall Hypolito, of Est. By Garuis Markham.
titleStmt.author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637.
Du Bellay, Joachim, 1525 (ca.)-1560. Vieille courtisane.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N[icholas] O[kes] for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shop by the great south gate of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Based on: Du Bellay, Joachim. La vieille courtisane.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: the great south gate of Paules
